elements.name: question3
elements.html: Rate your agreement with the following statements, from highly disagree (1) to highly agree (5).

elements.name: question1
elements.title: I was able to be expressive and creative while making storyboards.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: I was very engaged in this design activity - I enjoyed this activity and would do it again.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: I'm proud of the design I created.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: The storyboarding process helped me come up with ideas that will require me to use my knowledge of programming.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: I feel confident I can turn my storyboard ideas into Snap code.
